1.0.0.name: wordpress/single-sign-on
1.0.0.description:
Single Sign On allows a user to only sign in once and be signed in automatically across different systems. Currently supported systems include: * Wordpress * WHMCS

The plugin works over multiple instances of the same system, for example multiple Wordpress installations as well as between systems, for example between WHMCS and Wordpress.

Coming soon: * MyBB
